name: Save The Hive!
description:
Save The Hive! created by Georgia Wainwright

Modifications:

1. Changed the theme to bees!

2. Created a new player sprite and animated it

3. Created a new enemy and animated it 

4. Created a new background and animated it

5. Created new firing animations for the player character

6. Created new death animations for both the bee and wasp

7. Created a new barrier (changed the asteroids)

8. Changed the game name
